frontmatter.title: Array
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.Array` works in many ways similar to field-components. It has a value-property that can receive an array or you can give it a path if you want it to retrieve an array from a surrounding DataContext. All children components of Iterate.Array are rendered once per item the array-value consists of.

frontmatter.title: AnimatedContainer
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.AnimatedContainer` can be used to animate items when they are added or removed.

frontmatter.title: PushButton
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.PushButton` builds on top of the same data flow logic as field components, but the only thing it changes in the value it receives or retrieves from source data is adding a new item to the array.

frontmatter.title: PushContainer
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.PushContainer` enables users to create a new item in the array.

frontmatter.title: RemoveButton
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.RemoveButton` connects to the array of a surrounding Iterate.Array and removes the item when clicked.

frontmatter.title: ViewContainer
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.ViewContainer` enables users to toggle (with animation) the content of each item between the view and edit container.

frontmatter.title: EditContainer
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.EditContainer` enables users to toggle (with animation) the content of each item between the view and edit container.

frontmatter.title: Count
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.Count` is a helper component / function that returns the count of a data array or object.

frontmatter.title: ItemNo
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.ItemNo` is a helper component that can be used to render the current item number (index) in a given string.

frontmatter.title: Toolbar
frontmatter.description: `Iterate.Toolbar` is a helper component to be used within an `Iterate.AnimatedContainer` to add a toolbar to each item in the array.

frontmatter.title: Visibility
frontmatter.description: The `Iterate.Visibility` component allows you to conditionally display content based on relative paths (`itemPath`) within an `Iterate.Array` component.
